from collections import deque
from itertools import cycle
t = int(raw_input())
for _ in xrange(t):
    __  = raw_input()
    l = map(int, raw_input().split())
    order = []
    d = deque(sorted(l))
    for num in cycle([True, False]):
        if not d:
            break
        elif num:
            order.append(str(d.popleft()))
        else:
            order.append(str(d.pop()))
    print " ".join(order)
